meta.title: Terms and Conditions | AquaDecor USA
meta.description: US-specific terms covering product availability, manual inquiries, and Serbian export regulations.

sections.heading: US Market Availability
sections.content: Due to current international trade dynamics and import tariffs affecting shipments from Serbia to the United States, our online catalog and direct-purchase options for the US market are restricted to select items. These items are priced to include necessary import duties where possible to ensure a seamless delivery experience.

sections.heading: Manual Inquiry Process
sections.content: The automated price calculator is currently disabled for US-based customers. For custom-sized backgrounds or products not listed in the US store, we provide a personalized inquiry service. Please contact us at office@aquadecorbackgrounds.com with your aquarium dimensions for a manual quote that accounts for current logistics and tariff variables.

sections.heading: Payment and Production
sections.content: All US orders are handcrafted in our Serbian studio and require 100% advance payment. Once a manual quote is accepted and paid via our secure invoice link, the production process (typically 10–12 business days) begins. Large or highly complex custom projects may require additional time.

sections.heading: Measurement Responsibility
sections.content: AquaDecor is not responsible for fitment issues resulting from incorrect measurements provided by the customer. Because shipping and return logistics between Serbia and the US are extremely costly, we urge you to double-check all internal dimensions before finalizing your inquiry.

sections.heading: Communication Policy
sections.content: All official US inquiries and order tracking must be handled via email at office@aquadecorbackgrounds.com. Our social media channels are for gallery purposes only and cannot provide binding logistical quotes or order status for the US market.

sections.heading: 20-Year Structural Warranty
sections.content: Our 20-year structural warranty remains fully valid for the US market, covering material integrity and colorfastness. However, please note that while we provide replacement parts/items free of charge under warranty, the customer may be responsible for the international shipping costs associated with moving the replacement from Serbia to the USA.

sections.heading: Maintenance and Safety
content: Installation: Use only non-expired, aquarium-grade silicone. AquaDecor is not responsible for tank damage caused by improper installation.
Cleaning: Do not use harsh bristles or chemicals. Regular maintenance prevents algae buildup that could damage the protective coating.
Safety: Ensure fish species are size-appropriate for backgrounds with deep crevices to prevent entrapment.

meta.title: Privacy Policy | AquaDecor USA
meta.description: How we handle data for our US customers in compliance with international standards.

sections.heading: Data Usage for US Orders
sections.content: We collect your name, postal address, and email solely to facilitate international shipping and customs documentation required by US Customs and Border Protection. We do not sell or share your data with third-party marketers.

sections.heading: Cookies and Tracking
sections.content: We use essential cookies to manage your session and regional settings (ensuring you see US-available products). You may disable these in your browser, though it may affect site functionality.

sections.heading: Service Providers
sections.content: Your data is shared with trusted logistics partners (DHL Express, FedEx) and payment processors (Stripe, PayPal) to fulfill your order. These parties are contractually prohibited from using your data for any other purpose.

sections.heading: Children’s Privacy (COPPA)
sections.content: AquaDecor does not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. If we become aware of such data collection, it will be immediately purged from our servers.

sections.heading: External Links
sections.content: Our website may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. We strongly advise you to review the privacy policies of these external websites, as we have no control over their content or practices.

meta.title: Shipping and Tariffs | AquaDecor USA
meta.description: Logistics from Serbia to the US, including tariff-inclusive pricing and delivery times.

sections.heading: The Serbian-US Logistics Path
sections.content: All AquaDecor products are shipped directly from our manufacturing studio in Serbia. Due to the 'Handcrafted in Serbia' designation, shipments are subject to US import regulations. We utilize premium air express carriers (DHL/FedEx) to ensure the fastest possible transit across these borders.

sections.heading: Tariff-Inclusive Pricing
sections.content: For products available for direct purchase in our US store, we have adjusted the pricing to include estimated federal import tariffs. This 'Direct-Ship' model is designed to minimize administrative delays at the US border. However, please note that US Customs reserves the right to apply secondary inspections which are outside our control.

sections.heading: Estimated Transit Times
content: Transit: 5–15 business days via DHL Express/FedEx.
Note: US Customs processing may occasionally add 3–5 days to the final delivery date.

sections.heading: Custom Inquiry Shipping
sections.content: For custom orders handled via email, shipping costs and tariff estimates will be calculated individually based on the volume and weight of the crate. These will be clearly itemized in your manual invoice.

sections.heading: Lost or Damaged Shipments
sections.content: We guarantee the safe arrival of your items. If a package is declared lost by the carrier after 30 business days, or if major damage is reported within 48 hours of receipt (with photo evidence), we will manufacture and ship a replacement from our studio.

meta.title: Refund Policy | AquaDecor USA
meta.description: Cancellation fees and return policies for the US market.

sections.heading: Order Cancellation
sections.content: Once production has begun on your custom order, it cannot be fully refunded. Cancellations made prior to shipping incur a 40% fee to cover the specialized labor and materials already invested in your custom-sized background.

sections.heading: Final Sale Policy
sections.content: Due to the extreme costs associated with return shipping from the US to Serbia and the non-recoverable nature of import tariffs, all sales are final once the product has been dispatched. We do not accept returns for correctly manufactured items.

sections.heading: Damage Claims
sections.content: Any damage occurred during transit must be reported within 48 hours of delivery. This is a strict requirement from our international carriers. Reports made after this window cannot be processed for replacement.

sections.heading: Inquiry Withdrawal
sections.content: If you have requested a manual quote via email, you are under no obligation to purchase until the invoice is paid. Once the invoice is paid, the standard 40% cancellation fee applies if production has started.
